title: Handheld Computer-Utilized Science Inquiry Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific principles and ability to utilize core smartphone functionalities
context.additional_context: Enhancing competency in designing field-centered science lessons using handheld devices for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design scientific inquiry procedures to collect and analyze field data using handheld computers (smartphones).
Learners can develop technology-integrated science lesson plans by applying activity structure-based instructional methods.
Learners can establish project-based assessment criteria and provide peer feedback in collaborative learning environments.

resources: Handheld Science Experiment App (with Sensor Data Collection)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
